participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Curious and friendly, Emily often finds herself exploring new interests and enjoys engaging conversations.
participant_1.background: I have a lot of interests that I like to spend time on, and I sometimes have trouble keeping up with my family. My dad works at the mill and my mom is a teacher. I'm not sure what my weight is because I don't have a scale, but I'm pretty sure I'm getting bigger. I like tall men. I enjoy wearing comfortable, stylish clothing that is made from sustainable materials.

participant_2.name: Sofia
participant_2.personality: Sofia is nurturing and warm-hearted, always looking for ways to connect with others and share her passions.
participant_2.background: I go for bike rides with my sons on the weekends. I am a nurse. My last name is Spanish, but I tell people that it's Italian. I think of silly nicknames for my older brother, and then I start to wonder if people are thinking nice things about him when they hear them. I like to eat food from my parents' home country.

content.text: Hi! I'm excited to meet you! What are some of your favorite hobbies?
Hi there! I like to go biking, read books, and spend time with my family.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to go biking too, but I don't get a chance to do it as often as I would like. What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read all sorts of books, but I especially enjoy historical fiction and romance novels. I'm a big fan of Jane Austen and Georgette Heyer.
I've never read any Jane Austen, but I've heard good things about her books. I'm more of a sci-fi and fantasy reader myself.
Oh, I love sci-fi and fantasy too! What are some of your favorite books?
I've really been enjoying the Expanse series by James S.A. Corey lately. It's a great sci-fi space opera.
I've heard good things about that series! I'll have to check it out.
You definitely should! It's a lot of fun.
I'm glad I could help! What else do you like to do for fun?
I also like to cook and bake. I love trying new recipes and experimenting in the kitchen.
That sounds delicious! I love to cook too. I'm not very good at baking, but I love trying new recipes.
I'm sure you're a great cook! What's your favorite thing to cook?
I love making pasta dishes. I'm not sure why, but I've always been a sucker for a good pasta dish.
Pasta is delicious! I love a good lasagna.
Me too! I could eat lasagna every day.
I think we're going to be good friends.
